sourcesContent:
Dashboard

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MenuItem } from 'primeng/api'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu-bar', templateUrl: './menu-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu-bar.component.scss'] }) export class MenuBarComponent { menu: Array = [ {label: 'Home', icon: 'pi pi-home'}, {label: 'Customers', icon: 'pi pi-users'}, {label: 'Settings', icon: 'pi pi-cog'} ] }
